channel.title: I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi
channel.description: Recent content in I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi

item.title: Personal Website
item.description: I use Hugo, Bootstrap V4, FLask, and Heroku to build my personal website.

item.title: Flower Classification
item.description: In this project, I first developed a code for an image classifier built with PyTorch and then I converted it into a command line application.

item.title: Vehicle Detection
item.description: In this project, the goal is to write a software pipeline to detect vehicles in a video.

item.title: Advanced Lane Lines Detection
item.description: In this project, the goal is to write a software pipeline to identify the lane boundaries in a video.

item.title: Behavioral Cloning
item.description: In this project, I used deep neural networks and convolutional neural networks to clone driving behavior.

item.title: Traffic Sign Classification
item.description: In this project, convolutional neural networks are used to classify traffic signs.

item.title: Finding Donors for CharityML
item.description: In this project, several supervised algorithms of choice are used to accurately model individuals’ income using data collected from the 1994 U.S. Census.

item.title: Finding Lane Lines
item.description: Detecting lane lines in images using Python and OpenCV.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Self-driving Car Engineer Build and investigate Computer Vision and Deep Learning applications for Autonomous Driving and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems. Data Scientist Collect, store, transform, aggregate, and optimize data from various sensors for connected and automated vehicle applications. Software Engineer Develope programs in Python and C++ to interface with vehicles, build data pipelines, and demonstrate research ideas.

item.title: Publications
